item.title: How Can I Seperate This?
item.dc:creator: @Ptolemy_Alch Ptolemy Alch
item.description:
@Ptolemy_Alch wrote:


 if(playerRights >= 0) {
		  sendMessage("Welcome To AlchemyScape");
		  sendMessage("** Type ::commands To Get Commands **");
          sendMessage("--------------------------------------------");                      sendMessage("");
          sendMessage("Play By My Rules For A Chance At Admin / Mod");
          }
                 if(playerRights >= 1) {
                                     sendMessage("Welcome Back Moderator "+playerName);
		  sendMessage("--------------------------------------");
		  sendMessage("Type ::banuser name (To Ban, Only If They Break Rules");
                                      sendMessage("If You Abuse Your Powers I Will Ban You!");
                 }
                 if(playerRights >= 2) {
                                     sendMessage("Welcome Back Administrator "+playerName);
		  sendMessage("--------------------------------------");
		  sendMessage("Type ::banuser name  (To Ban, Only If They Break Rules");
                  sendMessage("If You Abuse Your Powers I Will Ban!");
                 }

Everything is together when i log on? Like it will say everything, when i only want it to say welcome back moderator (blah) if your mod =/ Someone help? Compile says it’s perfect.

Read full topic
